AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being transported in vehicles, displaying suspicious behavior such as sitting stiff and not communicating with each other
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck stopped by Officer Reymundo Reyes for failing to use a turn signal on Farm-to-Market Road 2050, searched after IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. gave consent, and had conflicting ownership claims
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: White Malibu sedan stopped by United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino, lacked wind farm sticker and was traveling on Farm-to-Market Road 2050 with out-of-town registration from Hertz Rental Car Company
